trans-unit.source: Implements low-level personalization operations.
trans-unit.target: 实现低级别个性化设置操作。

trans-unit.source: This class implements the logic required to carry out lower-level personalization operations.
trans-unit.target: 此类实现执行较低级别个性化设置操作所需的逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class manages the high-level life cycle of personalization, it is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class that is responsible for actually implementing the physical steps necessary to carry out specific personalization actions.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类管理个性化高级生命周期，它是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>负责实际实现所必需执行特定的个性化设置操作的物理步骤的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class in turn relies on an implementation of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> to communicate with the underlying data store for personalization information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>类又依赖于实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider>与个性化设置信息的基础数据存储进行通信。

trans-unit.source: If you use the default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, it creates an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class that you can use by referencing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的默认实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>，它创建的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>可以通过引用使用的类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> property, you would specify `WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>属性，则会指定`WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class is used, as well as providing an example of how personalization scope affects the results of personalized properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>使用类时，以及提供个性化设置作用域将如何影响个性化设置属性的结果的示例。

trans-unit.source: This example has five files:
trans-unit.target: 此示例具有五个文件：

trans-unit.source: An .aspx page that declaratively creates two Web Part zones, each with a control.
trans-unit.target: 一个.aspx 页面，以声明方式创建两个 Web 部件区域中，每个都有一个控件。

trans-unit.source: A user control called `Color.ascx` that allows a user to change a personalized property that applies a text box background color based on the user's authorization rights to modify state information and to enter shared scope.
trans-unit.target: 用户控件调用`Color.ascx`，它允许用户更改应用基于用户的授权权限来修改状态信息以及进入共享的范围文本背景色的个性化设置的属性。

trans-unit.source: A user control called `Persmode.ascx` that indicates what the current page scope is and what rights the current user has to enter shared scope or to modify data; it also provides two buttons; one to change scope and one to reset current user personalization information.
trans-unit.target: 用户控件调用`Persmode.ascx`，该值指示当前的页范围是且何种权限当前用户有输入共享的作用域或修改数据; 它还提供了两个按钮; 另一个用于更改作用域，另一个用于重置当前的用户个性化设置信息。

trans-unit.source: A login control that is used to authorize users.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于授权用户的登录控件。

trans-unit.source: A Web.config file with a section that provides an example of authorizing a user to modify personalization state and to enter shared scope.
trans-unit.target: 具有一节提供了一种授权用户修改个性化设置状态并输入共享的范围的 Web.config 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code creates an aspx page with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> and two Web Part zones and displays the `Color.ascx` and `Persmode.ascx` controls.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码创建的 aspx 页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>和两个 Web 部件区域中并显示`Color.ascx`和`Persmode.ascx`控件。

trans-unit.source: The page loads a login page that is used to get the current user information.
trans-unit.target: 用于获取当前的用户信息的登录页加载页面。

trans-unit.source: Use the ASP.NET Web Site Administration Tool in [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] to create users to access the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ASP.NET 网站管理工具中[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]若要创建用户访问页。

trans-unit.source: See the Web.config file for an example of a user granted authorization in the configuration file to change scope and modify state information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅授予配置文件中的授权用户，可以更改作用域和修改状态信息的示例的 Web.config 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following example code creates a login page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个登录页面。

trans-unit.source: After a successful login, it redirects to the main aspx page.
trans-unit.target: 成功登录后它重定向到主 aspx 页。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: The following example code is a portion of the Web.config file for this application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例代码是此应用程序的 Web.config 文件的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This section shows how to set authorization for a user, in this case "user2", to enter shared personalization scope and to modify personalization state information.
trans-unit.target: 本部分说明如何在这种情况下"user2"中设置的用户授权，输入共享个性化设置作用域以及如何修改个性化状态信息。

trans-unit.source: It also shows an example of a role, in this case "admin", that can be used to allow users in the "admin" role to enter shared personalization scope and to modify personalization state information.
trans-unit.target: 它还显示在此情况下"admin"，可用来允许用户在"管理员"角色中输入共享个性化设置范围和修改个性化设置状态信息的角色的一个示例。

trans-unit.source: The following example code creates a user control, called `Color.ascx`, that allows the user to change a personalized property, in this case the background color of two text boxes, based on the current personalization scope and the authorization rights of the user.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个用户控件，称为`Color.ascx`，，它允许用户更改的个性化设置的属性，在此情况下两个文本框中，根据当前的个性化设置范围和用户的授权权限的背景色.

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: The following example code creates a user control, called `Persmode.ascx`, that shows the current personalization scope and the user rights to modify state and to enter shared scope.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个用户控件，称为`Persmode.ascx`、 显示当前的个性化设置范围和用户的权限修改状态和输入共享的作用域。

trans-unit.source: It also has a reset button for resetting the current personalization state.
trans-unit.target: 它还具有用于重置当前的个性化状态重置按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> class works closely with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control and the rest of the personalization infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" />与紧密合作类<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />控制和个性化基础结构的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of personalization is a very robust subsystem that should meet your personalization needs.
trans-unit.target: 个性化设置的默认实现是应满足您的个性化需要十分可靠子系统。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, if you want to customize personalization, you can create a data provider for use as a personalization provider by creating a class that inherits from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，如果你想要自定义个性化设置，你可以创建的数据提供程序使用如个性化设置提供程序创建一个类继承自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: If you want to create a personalization subsystem significantly different from that provided by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> and the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> classes, you should create a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> implementation by deriving from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> and add your own custom logic.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要创建个性化子系统明显不同于所提供的<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" />和<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />类，应创建自定义<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" />由派生自实现<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" />并添加自己的自定义逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Then create a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> implementation by deriving from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />, add your own custom logic, and override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreatePersonalization" /> method to return your custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 然后创建自定义<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />由派生自实现<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />，添加您自己的自定义逻辑，并重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreatePersonalization" />方法以返回您的自定义<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" />实现。

trans-unit.source: Because a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control makes requests to the personalization infrastructure by way of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance, the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control does not directly interact with or hold references to <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider" /> implementations.
trans-unit.target: 因为<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />控制通过个性化基础结构向发出请求<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" />实例，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />控件不是直接与交互或保留对引用<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider" />实现。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> used to manage the personalization information
trans-unit.target: 用于管理个性化设置信息的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes an instance of this class and associates it with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control on whose behalf the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance will carry out personalization operations.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化此类的实例，并将其与关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件的名义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>个性化设置操作将执行实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="owner" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="owner" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies personalization data to either a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance, or to a specific <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 将个性化设置数据应用于与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 实例关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> 控件，或应用于特定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Applies personalization data to the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将个性化设置数据应用于父 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to apply personalization state to the supplied Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>属性设置为`true`，此方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>实例将应用于提供的 Web 部件控件的个性化设置状态。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to apply personalization state prior to the state being loaded from the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: 在从基础数据存储区加载状态之前，进行了应用个性化设置状态的尝试。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The personalization state returned from the data store was <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 从数据存储区返回的个性化设置状态为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to which personalization data is to be applied.
trans-unit.target: 要对其应用个性化设置数据的 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: Applies personalization data to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control when requested to do so by the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当父 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控件请求将个性化设置数据应用于指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件时，按照其请求执行。

trans-unit.source: This method is called to apply personalization data to an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>-derived class when requested to do so by the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法将个性化数据应用于单个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>-派生类请求为此，则父级时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to apply personalization state to the supplied Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>属性设置为`true`，此方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ApplyWebPartPersonalization%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>实例将应用于提供的 Web 部件控件的个性化设置状态。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to apply personalization state to a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 进行了将个性化设置状态应用于不受父 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 管理的 Web 部件控件的尝试。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPart" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPart" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to apply personalization state prior to the state being loaded from the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: 在从基础数据存储区加载状态之前，进行了应用个性化设置状态的尝试。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The personalization state returned from the data store was <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 从数据存储区返回的个性化设置状态为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
An attempt was made to apply personalization data more than once to the same Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 进行了将个性化设置数据应用于同一个 Web 部件控件的多次尝试。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the user is authorized to enter <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> scope.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示用户是否已授权可以进入 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> 范围。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user is authorized to enter <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> scope; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户已授权可以进入 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> 范围，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` if the user is authorized in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> to enter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared> scope.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`true`如果用户授权中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>输入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared>作用域。

trans-unit.source: The first time the property is called, it determines the user's right to enter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared> scope and caches the information.
trans-unit.target: 第一次调用该属性，它将确定用户的右输入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared>作用域，缓存信息。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A> dictionary is modified after the first time this property is called, changes are not shown on subsequent calls to this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>字典之后修改第一次此属性被调用时，更改不会显示在对此属性的后续调用。

trans-unit.source: The following code demonstrates using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.CanEnterSharedScope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.CanEnterSharedScope%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger code sample found in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class description.
trans-unit.target: 此代码是在中找到一个更大的代码示例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>类的说明。

trans-unit.source: The new personalization scope for the current page.
trans-unit.target: 当前页的新个性化设置范围。

trans-unit.source: Changes the current page's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> instance to the scope specified.
trans-unit.target: 将当前页的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> 实例更改为指定的范围。

trans-unit.source: This method changes the currently executing page's personalization scope to the new scope specified by the `newScope` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由指定的新作用域更改当前正在执行页的个性化设置范围`newScope`参数。

trans-unit.source: This method is the protected helper method that is called by the public <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是调用由公共受保护的帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This protected method exists to handle future extensibility if there are more than two possible scopes to switch between.
trans-unit.target: 此受保护的方法存在是为了处理未来的扩展性，如果有多个两个可能的作用域之间进行切换。

trans-unit.source: If the current scope and `newScope` are the same value, then this method performs no operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前作用域和`newScope`都是相同的值，则此方法不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: If attempting to switch from <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" /> scope to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> scope, the current user does not have the user capability to enter <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试从 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" /> 范围切换到 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> 范围，则当前用户不具有进入 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> 范围的用户功能。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="scope" /> is not a valid member of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="scope" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> 枚举的有效成员。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control supplying the personalization data.
trans-unit.target: 提供个性化设置数据的 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control receiving the personalization data.
trans-unit.target: 接收个性化设置数据的 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: Extracts the personalization state from one Web Parts control and applies it to a second Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 从一个 Web 部件控件提取个性化设置状态，并将它应用于另一个 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: This method extracts the personalization state from `webPartA` and applies it to `webPartB`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提取个性化状态从`webPartA`和将其应用于`webPartB`。

trans-unit.source: This method assumes that `webPartA` and `webPartB` are the same type.
trans-unit.target: 此方法假定`webPartA`和`webPartB`具有相同的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the Web Parts controls are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls, the method copies the personalization state from the child control wrapped in `webPartA` to the child control wrapped in `webPartB`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Web 部件控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件，则该方法会将个性化状态复制从包装中的子控件`webPartA`给子控件包装在`webPartB`。

trans-unit.source: As part of the copy operation, `webPartB` is marked as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: 作为复制操作的一部分`webPartB`被标记为"脏"。

trans-unit.source: Either <paramref name="webPartA" /> or <paramref name="webPartB" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPartA" /> 或 <paramref name="webPartB" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPartA" /> and <paramref name="webPartB" /> are not of the same <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPartA" /> 和 <paramref name="webPartB" /> 不是同一种 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="webPartA" /> and <paramref name="webPartB" /> are <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> controls but one or both lack a child control.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPartA" /> 和 <paramref name="webPartB" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> 控件，但其中一个（或两个都）缺少子控件。

trans-unit.source: \- or -

<paramref name="webPartA" /> and <paramref name="webPartB" /> are <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> controls, but their child controls are not of the same <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPartA" /> 和 <paramref name="webPartB" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> 控件，但它们的子控件不是同一种 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否请求启用关联 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件的个性化设置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if personalization is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用个性化设置，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示是否请求个性化若要启用父<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: Note that this is a subtle but important distinction from the intent of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这是细微但重要的意图的区别<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set prior to the completion of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅在完成之前设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In practice, this means that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled%2A> property must be set in the page markup on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element if personalization should be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在实践中，这意味着，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled%2A>属性必须在设置中的页标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>元素是否应该禁用个性化设置。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以将此属性设置期间`PreInit`阶段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property value after the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method had completed.
trans-unit.target: 在完成关联 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法之后，进行了设置此属性值的尝试。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating which type of check should be made.
trans-unit.target: 布尔值，指示应进行哪种类型的检查。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance has completed initialization or that the current user has rights to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: 确保 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> 实例已完成初始化或当前用户具有修改个性化设置状态的权限。

trans-unit.source: This method is a helper method used in several <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> methods to ensure one of two things:
trans-unit.target: 此方法是帮助器方法，用于在几<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>方法以确保两个操作之一：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance has completed initialization (for example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method was called and successfully completed).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>实例已完成初始化 (例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>方法已调用并已成功完成)。

trans-unit.source: This check is made if the `ensureModifiable` parameter equals `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果进行此检查`ensureModifiable`参数等于`false`。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The current user has rights to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: 当前用户有权修改个性化设置状态。

trans-unit.source: This check is made if `ensureModifiable` equals `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果进行此检查`ensureModifiable`等于`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control also calls this method in a number of cases:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件还会在许多情况下调用此方法：

trans-unit.source: To switch the display mode to something other than normal.
trans-unit.target: 若要切换为正常以外的项目的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: The current user must have rights to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: 当前用户必须具有的权限修改个性化设置状态。

trans-unit.source: To add, delete, or move Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加，删除或移动 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: The current user must have rights to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: 当前用户必须具有的权限修改个性化设置状态。

trans-unit.source: To connect, disconnect, and edit Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: 若要连接，断开连接，并编辑 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: The current user must have rights to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: 当前用户必须具有的权限修改个性化设置状态。

trans-unit.source: To export the Web Parts controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: 若要导出页上的 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance must have completed initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>实例必须已完成初始化。

trans-unit.source: To import Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: 若要导入 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: The current user must have rights to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: 当前用户必须具有的权限修改个性化设置状态。

trans-unit.source: The current user does not have rights to modify personalization information, or other checks failed.
trans-unit.target: 当前用户不具有修改个性化设置信息的权限，或其他检查失败。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled" /> returned <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled" /> 返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> instance of a user's authorization to enter <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> scope.
trans-unit.target: 表示进入 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> 范围的用户授权的 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The user right is represented by the string "enterSharedScope" in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> instance.
trans-unit.target: 已将用户权限由字符串"enterSharedScope"表示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>实例。

trans-unit.source: Extracts personalization data from the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从父 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件中提取个性化设置数据。

trans-unit.source: Extracts personalization data from the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从父 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件中提取个性化设置数据。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, and personalization state is not being reset during the page request (such as when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> property is `false`), then this method extracts personalization data from the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control during its <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>属性设置为`true`，和个性化设置状态将不重置在页请求期间 (例如，当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>属性是`false`)，则此方法从父提取个性化数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>期间控制其<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartManagerPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to extract personalization state from the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartManagerPersonalization%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>实例从父提取个性化设置状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to extract personalization state prior to the state being loaded from the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: 在从基础数据存储区加载状态之前，进行了提取个性化设置状态的尝试。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
Personalization state has not been applied yet.
trans-unit.target: 尚未应用个性化设置状态。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> has changed since personalization data was applied.
trans-unit.target: 自应用个性化设置数据以来，<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 已更改。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The personalization state returned from the data store was <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 从数据存储区返回的个性化设置状态为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control containing personalization data to be extracted.
trans-unit.target: 包含要提取的个性化设置数据的 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: Extracts personalization data from a Web Parts control when requested to do so by the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当父 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件请求从 Web 部件控件提取个性化设置数据时，按照其请求执行。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, and personalization state is not being reset during the page request (such as when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> property is `false`), then this method extracts personalization data from the Web Parts control specified by `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>属性设置为`true`，和个性化设置状态将不重置在页请求期间 (例如，当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>属性是`false`)，则此方法从 Web 部件控件提取个性化数据指定的`webPart`。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartPersonalization%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance to extract personalization state from the supplied Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.ExtractWebPartPersonalization%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>实例从提供的 Web 部件控件提取个性化设置状态。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to extract personalization state from a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 进行了从不受父 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 管理的 Web 部件控件提取个性化设置状态的尝试。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to extract personalization state prior to the state being loaded from the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: 在从基础数据存储区加载状态之前，进行了提取个性化设置状态的尝试。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
Personalization state has not been applied yet.
trans-unit.target: 尚未应用个性化设置状态。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> has changed since personalization data was applied.
trans-unit.target: 自应用个性化设置数据以来，<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 已更改。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The personalization state returned from the data store was <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 从数据存储区返回的个性化设置状态为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the Web Parts control associated with the filter to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 与要检索的筛选器关联的 Web 部件控件的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the authorization filter, if any, associated with the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 检索与指定的 Web 部件控件关联的授权筛选器（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: The authorization filter for the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 Web 部件控件的授权筛选器。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves the authorization filter, if any, associated with the Web Parts control identified by `webPartID`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检索的授权筛选器，如果任何，与标识的 Web 部件控件相关联`webPartID`。

trans-unit.source: Each Web Parts control that is serialized and managed by personalization is associated with a `webPartID` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 序列化并由个性化设置的每个 Web 部件控件与`webPartID`参数。

trans-unit.source: At run time, a page's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control can filter the controls displayed on a page by determining whether each Web Parts control is authorized.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，页面<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件可以筛选显示在页上通过确定是否授权每个 Web 部件控件的控件。

trans-unit.source: This authorization information is stored as a string in the data associated with each Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 此授权信息作为字符串中与每个 Web 部件控件关联的数据存储。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to retrieve an authorization filter when <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled" /> is <see langword="false" /> by calling this method too early in the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled" /> 为 <see langword="false" /> 的情况下，在页的生命周期中，过早地通过调用此方法进行了检索授权筛选器的尝试。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
An attempt was made to retrieve an authorization filter and no personalization state has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: 进行了检索授权筛选器的尝试，但是尚未加载任何个性化设置状态。

trans-unit.source: \- or
The personalization state returned from the data store was <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 从数据存储区返回的个性化设置状态为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPartID" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPartID" /> 为 <see langword="null" /> 或空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the current page and personalization scope have associated personalization data.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示当前页和个性化设置范围是否具有关联个性化设置数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the page has personalization data associated with it; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果页具有与之关联的个性化设置数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenient method for determining whether the current page and scope combination has personalization data associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 这是用于确定当前页和范围的组合是否具有与之关联的个性化数据的简便方法。

trans-unit.source: Internally, the method calls <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A> on the provider to determine whether data exists.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，该方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>上要确定数据是否存在的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: There is no personalization provider associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 没有与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> 实例关联的个性化设置提供程序。

trans-unit.source: This can occur if the property is accessed prior to the completion of the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果在关联 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法完成之前访问该属性，则会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Page" /> property for the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Page" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 属性值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -

The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Request" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Request" /> 控件的关联 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 属性的值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置默认个性化设置范围。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> indicating the default personalization scope of the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" />，指示关联 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 的默认个性化设置范围。

trans-unit.source: This property represents the default personalization scope that should be used for the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control in the absence of previous knowledge about the proper scope.
trans-unit.target: 此属性表示应用于父的默认个性化设置范围<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>以前了解适当的作用域没有的控件。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not explicitly set, it defaults to returning <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User> scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果未显式设置此属性，则默认为返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User>作用域。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set prior to the completion of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅在完成之前设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In practice, this means <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> must be set in the page markup on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element.
trans-unit.target: 在实践中，这意味着<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>必须在设置中的页标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>元素。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以将此属性设置期间`PreInit`阶段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than its current value after the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method had completed.
trans-unit.target: 在完成关联 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法之后，进行了将此属性设置为当前值以外的值的尝试。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set a value of <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope" /> that is not a member of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 尝试为不是 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope" /> 枚举成员的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> 设置一个值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization is enabled and has successfully loaded personalization data for this instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用了个性化设置，以及是否为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> 类的这一实例成功加载了个性化设置数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if personalization is enabled for the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance and personalization data has successfully loaded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为当前的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> 实例启用了个性化设置且成功加载了个性化设置数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Prior to loading personalization data, this property will always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 之前加载个性化数据，此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: For example, this property will return `false` during the `PreInit` phase.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此属性将返回`false`期间`PreInit`阶段。

trans-unit.source: After the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>'s <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method has successfully completed (during which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method is called), this property will then return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>方法已成功完成 (在此期间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>调用方法)，然后返回此属性将`true`。

trans-unit.source: This property is a publicly accessible alias for the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是受保护的可公开访问别名<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsInitialized%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization is enabled and has successfully loaded personalization data for this instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用了个性化设置，以及是否为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> 类的这一实例成功加载了个性化设置数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if personalization is initialized for this instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此实例的个性化设置已初始化，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the personalization feature is enabled (if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled%2A> property is set to `true`), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance is considered initialized immediately after the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>'s <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method has successfully completed (during which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method is called).
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了个性化功能 (如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled%2A>属性设置为`true`)，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>实例被视为初始化后立即关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>方法已成功完成 （在此期间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>调用方法)。

trans-unit.source: Prior to loading personalization data, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 之前加载个性化数据，此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current user is authorized to modify state information.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前用户是否已授权可以修改状态信息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user is authorized to modify state information; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户已授权可以修改状态信息，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The first time this property is called, it caches the result of determining the user’s right to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: 第一次调用此属性时，它将缓存的结果确定用户的权限才能修改个性化设置状态。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A> dictionary is modified after the first time this property is called, changes are not reflected in subsequent calls to this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.UserCapabilities%2A>调用此属性在首次后修改字典，更改不会反映在后续调用此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code demonstrates using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsModifiable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsModifiable%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger code sample found in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class description.
trans-unit.target: 此代码是在中找到一个更大的代码示例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>类的说明。

trans-unit.source: Initializes personalization.
trans-unit.target: 初始化个性化设置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> instance for the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 父 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: This is the main entry point for initializing personalization information on behalf of the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 这是初始化代表父级的个性化设置数据的主入口点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在父过程中调用此方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Normally, if personalization has been disabled on the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, this method will never be called.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，如果已对父禁用个性化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件，将永远不会调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: During the course of this method, the following initializations occur:
trans-unit.target: 在此方法的过程中，将发生以下初始化：

trans-unit.source: A reference to either the default personalization provider, or the custom provider indicated in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> page markup or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName%2A> property, is obtained.
trans-unit.target: 对默认的个性化设置提供程序或自定义提供程序的引用所示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>页面标记或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName%2A>获取属性。

trans-unit.source: The provider is called to determine the user capabilities (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineUserCapabilities%2A>) for the currently executing user.
trans-unit.target: 调用该提供程序来确定用户功能 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineUserCapabilities%2A>) 为当前正在执行的用户。

trans-unit.source: The personalization state for the current page/user/scope combination is loaded from the underlying data store by the provider (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.LoadPersonalizationState%2A>) and stored within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前作用域用户/页/组合的个性化设置状态提供程序，从基础数据存储区加载 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.LoadPersonalizationState%2A>) 并存储在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>实例。

trans-unit.source: The personalization scope for the current page/user/scope is determined by the provider (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineInitialScope%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 当前页/用户/范围的个性化设置范围由提供程序 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.DetermineInitialScope%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: Note that the result of this determination might be different than the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此决定的结果可能是不同的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The scope value returned from this method is used as the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的作用域值用作的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception due to personalization not being enabled will occur only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method is called directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>由于个性化设置未启用的异常时才将发生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>直接调用方法。

trans-unit.source: In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the load, and this helper method silently returns if personalization has not been enabled for the page.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 实现中，内部帮助程序方法实际上调用来执行负载，和此帮助器方法以无提示方式返回如果没有为页上启用个性化时。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when personalization is not enabled (<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled" /> equals <see langword="false" />).
trans-unit.target: 如果个性化设置未启用（<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Enabled" /> 等于 <see langword="false" />），则调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Page" /> property for the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Page" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 属性值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -

The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Request" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Request" /> 控件的关联 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 属性的值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A provider was explicitly set in either the page markup or the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName" /> property and the provider could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 页面标记或 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName" /> 属性中显式设置了一个提供程序，但未能找到该提供程序。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The object containing the personalization state data is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含个性化设置状态数据的对象为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A problem occurred while loading and deserializing data.
trans-unit.target: 加载和反序列化数据时出现问题。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
An error occurred in the definition of a personalization provider in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件中的个性化设置提供程序的定义出现错误。

trans-unit.source: The underlying personalization providers failed to initialize because a default provider could not be found or because a failure occurred while attempting to initialize a personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: 基础个性化设置提供程序未能初始化，原因是未能找到默认提供程序或在尝试初始化个性化设置提供程序时出错。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> instance of a user's authorization to modify personalization state.
trans-unit.target: 表示修改个性化设置状态的用户权限的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The user right is represented by the string "modifyState" in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> instance.
trans-unit.target: 已将用户权限由字符串"modifyState"表示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the provider name for personalization.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置个性化设置的提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: 个性化设置提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value set for this property in the page declaration.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回为此属性页声明中设置的值。

trans-unit.source: If this property was not set, it returns <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，它将返回<xref:System.String.Empty>。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the page uses the default personalization provider specified in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，页使用默认个性化设置提供程序配置文件中指定。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set prior to the completion of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅在完成之前设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This means the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName%2A> property must be set in the page declaration on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ProviderName%2A>属性必须在设置页声明中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>元素。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以将此属性设置期间`PreInit`阶段。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than its current value after the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method has completed.
trans-unit.target: 在完成 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法之后，进行了将此属性设置为当前值以外的值的尝试。

trans-unit.source: Resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: 在基础数据存储区中重置当前的页、范围和用户的个性化设置数据。

trans-unit.source: This method resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将重置为当前页、 范围和基础数据存储区中的用户的个性化数据。

trans-unit.source: As a side effect of the reset, the currently executing page is re-executed by a <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 重置的副作用，当前正在执行的页重新执行通过<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Note that this transfer re-executes the current page as a `GET` request regardless of how the page was originally requested.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此传输重新执行当前页作为`GET`请求，而与该页最初请求的方式无关。

trans-unit.source: This method can be called at any time.
trans-unit.target: 可以在任何时候调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A> method on the provider.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在内部调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A>上的提供程序的方法。

trans-unit.source: After data is successfully reset, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 已成功重置数据后，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ShouldResetPersonalizationState%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: This property is used elsewhere by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> instance to bypass extracting personalization data from control properties and saving it if data has already been reset.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性是其他地方<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>要跳过从控件属性的解压个性化数据实例并将其保存，如果数据已重置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance cannot reference a valid personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> 实例无法引用有效的个性化设置提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Saves personalization data for the current page, scope, and user to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: 将当前的页、范围和用户的个性化设置数据保存到基础数据存储区。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用期间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete>事件。

trans-unit.source: Internally, the method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.SavePersonalizationState%2A> method on the provider.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，该方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.SavePersonalizationState%2A>上的提供程序的方法。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to save personalization data when the currently executing user does not have the capability called <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability> (within the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> instance) results in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 在尝试保存个性化数据，如果当前正在执行的用户不具有调用的功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability>(在当前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>实例) 会导致<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>异常。

trans-unit.source: Note that this would only be true if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control called the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Save%2A> method directly.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这将仅是 true 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件调用受保护<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Save%2A>直接的方法。

trans-unit.source: In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the save, and this helper method silently returns if the currently executing user does not have rights to modify data.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 实现中，内部帮助程序方法实际上调用来执行保存，和此帮助器方法以无提示方式返回如果当前正在执行的用户没有权限，无法修改数据。

trans-unit.source: The current user does not have the capability called <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前的用户不具有称为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability" /> 的功能。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance cannot reference a valid personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> 实例无法引用有效的个性化设置提供程序。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
No personalization provider is currently associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前没有任何个性化设置提供程序与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> 实例相关联。

trans-unit.source: This can occur if this method is called prior to calling <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load" /> (the personalization provider reference is obtained during the call to <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load" /> 之前调用此方法，则可能发生这种情况（个性化设置提供程序引用是在调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load" /> 期间获取的。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
No personalization state has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: 尚未加载任何个性化设置状态。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance for the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 实例为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -

The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Request" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Request" /> 控件的关联 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 属性的值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current personalization scope for the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取父 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件的当前个性化设置范围。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> instance indicating the scope of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> 实例，指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 的范围。

trans-unit.source: This value is initially set based on the value returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此值最初设置基于从返回的值上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This value can be modified by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以修改此值，通过调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that this represents the scope used for applying and extracting personalization information.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此令牌表示用于应用和提取个性化设置信息的作用域。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property might differ from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值可能会与不同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A>属性或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Marks the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: 将父 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件标记为具有已更改的个性化数据（即“脏数据”）。

trans-unit.source: Marks the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: 将父 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 控件标记为具有已更改的个性化数据（即“脏数据”）。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method marks the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>属性设置为`true`，此方法将标记父<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件用作"脏"。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation details of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, this method might invoke security checks and code access security permission checks.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于的实现详细信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>，此方法可能调用安全检查和代码访问安全性权限检查。

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在内部调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control tracks "dirty" state internally and exposes the "dirtiness" of the manager through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A> property rather than through this method.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件内部跟踪"脏"的状态，并将公开通过管理器的"更新"<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A>属性而不是通过此方法。

trans-unit.source: No personalization data has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: 尚未加载任何个性化设置数据。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be marked "dirty".
trans-unit.target: 要标记为“更新”的 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: Marks the specified Web Parts control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 Web 部件控件标记为具有已更改（即“更新”）的个性化设置数据。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method marks the specified Web Parts control as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A>属性设置为`true`，此方法将标记为"脏"指定的 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation details of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, this method may invoke security checks and code access security permission checks.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于的实现详细信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>，此方法可能调用安全检查和代码访问安全性权限检查。

trans-unit.source: Attempted to mark as "dirty" a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 进行了将不受父 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 管理的 Web 部件控件标记为“更新”的尝试。

trans-unit.source: No personalization data has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: 尚未加载任何个性化设置数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the personalization data of the current page has been reset (for example, a request was made to delete the personalization data from the underlying data store).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前页的个性化设置数据是否已重置（例如，已请求从基础数据存储区删除个性化设置数据）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the personalization state for the current page has been reset; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前页的个性化设置状态已重置，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, it indicates that the personalization state for the current page has been reset and that extraction of personalization data from controls and subsequent save operations should be skipped.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`true`，它表示已重置当前页的个性化设置状态，提取的个性化数据从控件和后续保存操作应跳过。

trans-unit.source: Currently, this property is automatically set to `true` by the personalization infrastructure if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 目前，此属性自动设置为`true`个性化基础结构如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that although there are no restrictions on when this property can be set, the property must be set to `true` prior to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> event to have any effect.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，虽然有时可以设置此属性没有限制，但该属性必须设置为`true`之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete>事件以产生任何影响。

trans-unit.source: Switches the current page's personalization scope from <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" /> to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> or from <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" />.
trans-unit.target: 将当前页的个性化设置范围从 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" /> 切换到 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" />，或从 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> 切换到 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" />。

trans-unit.source: This method toggles the currently executing page's personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: 此方法切换当前正在执行页的个性化设置范围。

trans-unit.source: Toggling the scope results in a <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> back to the current executing page.
trans-unit.target: 切换范围导致<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A>回当前正在执行的页。

trans-unit.source: This method performs no operation if it is called while an export or import of a Web Parts control is occurring.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生的 Web 部件控件的导入或导出时调用，此方法会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: If a toggle scope request occurs for a page that was submitted via a `POST` request, then any query string values will be preserved during the transfer; query string parameters are not preserved if the page was submitted via a `GET` request.
trans-unit.target: 如果切换范围请求则会发生页通过提交`POST`请求，则任何查询字符串值将保留在传输过程; 如果已通过提交页面，不会保留查询字符串参数`GET`请求。

trans-unit.source: The following code demonstrates using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger code sample found in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class description.
trans-unit.target: 此代码是在中找到一个更大的代码示例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>类的说明。

trans-unit.source: The current user does not have the user capability to enter <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> scope when attempting to switch from <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" /> scope to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> scope.
trans-unit.target: 在尝试从 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> 范围切换到 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" /> 范围时，当前用户不具有进入 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> 范围的用户功能。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance has not completed initialization.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> 实例尚未完成初始化。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance for the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 实例为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -

The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Request" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Request" /> 控件的关联 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 属性的值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to toggle to a scope that is not defined in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 进行了切换到未在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> 枚举中定义的范围的尝试。

trans-unit.source: Technically, this situation should never occur.
trans-unit.target: 从技术角度看，绝不应出现这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of user capabilities from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> granted to the current user.
trans-unit.target: 从授予当前用户的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> 获取用户功能集。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> containing the set of user capabilities granted to the current user, or an empty <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary" /> if the user is anonymous.
trans-unit.target: 包含授予当前用户的一组用户功能的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />，如果用户为匿名用户，则为空的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: Currently the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> class contains two values indicating a user's capabilities: `modifyState` and `enterSharedScope`.
trans-unit.target: 当前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability>类包含两个值，该值指示用户的功能：`modifyState`和`enterSharedScope`。

trans-unit.source: For ease of use, the capabilities contained within the dictionary can be checked with the helper properties <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsModifiable%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.CanEnterSharedScope%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 为了便于使用，可以使用帮助器属性检查字典中包含的功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsModifiable%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.CanEnterSharedScope%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Note the restrictions on changing capabilities after either of these properties have been accessed; for details, see the description section of each property.
trans-unit.target: 请注意对访问其中任何一个属性; 后更改功能的限制有关详细信息，请参阅每个属性的描述部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the current parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control associated with this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 实例关联的当前父 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> 控件的实例。

trans-unit.source: The current parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前父 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with this instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来确定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>与此实例的关联控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>类。
